snippet: Lawmakers took aim at JPMorgan Chase for misleading investors and regulators about a disastrous bet, building off a scathing 300-page Congressional report released on Thursday.
abstract: Lawmakers took aim at JPMorgan Chase for misleading investors and regulators about a disastrous bet, building off a scathing 300-page Congressional report released on Thursday.

headline.main: Withering Questions at Senate Hearing on JPMorgan Loss
headline.print_headline: JPMorgan Executives Face Withering Questions at Senate Hearing
